title: Theatre of Apollonia
description: The theatre of the ancient city of Apollonia, situated just outside the city wall, on the east side. The construction appears to be late Hellenistic, with half of the seats cut out of the rock on the elevation of the acropolis, and the other half built up.

properties.description: Representative OpenStreetMap location of the ruins of the Hellenistic theatre in the ancient city of Apollonia (modern Marsa Susa).
properties.title: OSM location of the Theatre in Apollonia
